pkgmetadata.longdescription: Scale Graphics Devices Using Plot Dimensions // Figures rendered on graphics devices are usually rescaled to fit pre-determined device dimensions. 'plotscale' implements the reverse: desired plot dimensions are specified and device dimensions are calculated to accommodate marginal material, giving consistent proportions for plot elements. Default methods support grid graphics such as lattice and ggplot. See "example('devsize')" and "vignette('plotscale')".
